// stole from https://github.com/andfanilo/streamlit-echarts/blob/master/streamlit_echarts/frontend/src/utils.js Thanks andfanilo
function mapObject(obj,fn){return Object.keys(obj).reduce(function(res,key){res[key]=fn(obj[key]);return res;},{});}function deepMap(obj,fn){var deepMapper=function deepMapper(val){return val!==null&&typeof val==="object"?deepMap(val,fn):fn(val);};if(Array.isArray(obj)){return obj.map(deepMapper);}if(typeof obj==="object"){return mapObject(obj,deepMapper);}return obj;}export default deepMap;
